coffee.description: Espresso, a concentrated coffee made by forcing hot after through finely-ground coffee beans

coffee.title: Cappuccino
coffee.description: The classic italian type of coffe made of espresso, streamed milk, and thick foam

coffee.title: latte
coffee.description: An Espresso with streamed milk and a dolltop of milk foam, making it smootherand gentlerl

coffee.title: Americano
coffee.description: Made by diluting Espresso with hot water. its like milder coffee

coffee.title: Macchiato
coffee.description: An Espresso 'stained' with a small amount of milk

coffee.title: Mocha
coffee.description: Made with Espresso, chocolate and steamed milk

coffee.title: Ristretto
coffee.description: Concentrated form of Espresso with shorter extraction time
